--- title: aiadv keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "A small helper library to download the datasets that are used in our course." description: "A small helper library to download the datasets that are used in our course." ---
{% raw %}

This file will become your README and also the index of your documentation.

Install

pip install aiadv

How to use

There is only two things that you need to know

URLs class

This class saves the id and file name of all the available datasets

URLs.MOVIE_LENS_SAMPLE

{'id': '1k2y0qC0E3oHeGA5a427hRgfbW7hnQBgF', 'fname': 'movie_lens_sample.zip'}

untar_data function

This function will download the dataset for you and will return the path.

untar_data(URLs.YELP_REIVEWS)

That's it!

{% endraw %}
